column5: Saw this advertised in a magazine.  I wonder how well the cleats would flip over after you had been walking in mud and snow.  http://www.olangcanada.com/index_an.html
Ya, I see what your getting at. Not sure.
Rocky used to have boots like this... Forget the name  Tried buying em but couldn't get size 13
Great idea but the price is just a little restrictive.
Put them on Baffin Titians and I,m all over it,as I only use them for ice fishing.
